workDescription: Add push notification system for daily workout goals and achievement celebrations. Users forget to log their workouts and miss their streaks. Timely reminders and positive reinforcement will increase engagement.

context.userProblem: Users start strong but lose momentum. 60% of new users drop off after 2 weeks because they forget to engage.
context.businessValue: Increase 2-week retention from 40% to 55%. Boost daily active users by 20%.
context.currentState: No push notification capability. Email reminders only (low open rate).

outOfScope: Smart timing based on usage patterns
rabbitHoles: Handling app in background vs. foreground
noGos: Don't build a full messaging system
Don't do ML-based send time optimization

expectedScopes: Daily goal reminder with user-selected time
successCriteria: Daily reminder sends reliably at chosen time
Works on both iOS and Android
notes: Example shows infrastructure work within 6-week appetite
Good example of cutting scope (no custom schedules)
Shows how to fit complex feature in big-batch cycle
